vote.text: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S1030-1032; text: CR S1030) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 3899.
